oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ACTA: Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This part of the program (2 projects) concerns the comparison of control strategies against the thistle (Cirsium arvense (L.) Scop.) in organic crop system and researches about plants and seeds.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} ACTA: Crop husbandry. Runs 2002 - 2004. Programme Leader(s): Gu√©rineau, C.; Fontaine, L. and Rodriguez, A..
